original_text: Your money no longer has any value. Insects have eaten your beautiful clothes and they have spoiled them.
korean_text: 너희 재물은 썩었고 너희 옷은 좀먹었으며

sentences.original_text: Your money no longer has any value
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 돈은 더 이상 가치가 없습니다

sentences.original_text: Insects have eaten your beautiful clothes
